name: Central Park
description: A large public park offering walking trails, picnic areas, and a lake.

name: City Museum
description: A museum showcasing the rich history and culture of the city.

name: Sunrise Library
description: A community library with a vast collection of books and digital resources.

name: Riverwalk Market
description: A lively market with local vendors, food trucks, and handmade goods.

name: Adventure Water Park
description: A family-friendly water park with slides, lazy river, and splash zones.

name: Grandview Theater
description: A historic theater presenting plays, concerts, and film festivals.

name: Mountain Trailhead
description: Popular hiking trail with scenic overlooks and wildlife sightings.

name: Tech Innovation Hub
description: A co-working space and startup incubator for tech entrepreneurs.

name: Harmony Gardens
description: Botanical gardens with seasonal flower displays and guided tours.
